languages.text: {n}Арджента мягко улыбается.{/n} "Благодарю тебя, отважный Ульфар. О более надежном и бдительном страже нельзя было бы и мечтать... Но сегодня мне не понадобятся твои мощь и товарищеское плечо".
{n}Argenta smiles softly.{/n} "Thank you, brave Ulfar. One could not ask for a more dependable and vigilant protector. But I won't need to lean on your mighty shoulder today."
languages.original_text: {n}Арджента мягко улыбается.{/n} "Благодарю тебя, отважный Ульфар. О более надежном и бдительном страже нельзя было бы и мечтать... Но сегодня мне не понадобятся твои мощь и товарищеское плечо".

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta smiles softly.{/n} "Thank you, brave Ulfar. One could not ask for a more dependable and vigilant protector. But I won't need to lean on your mighty shoulder today."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}アルジェンタが優しく微笑む。{/n}「ありがとうございます、勇敢なるウルファー様。これほど頼りになり用心深い護衛はいません。けれど今日はその強い肩によりかからなくてもいいようだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta smiles softly.{/n} "Thank you, brave Ulfar. One could not ask for a more dependable and vigilant protector. But I won't need to lean on your mighty shoulder today."

traits.locale_text: {n}アルジェンタが優しく微笑む。{/n}「ありがとうございます、勇敢なるウルファー様。これほど頼りになり用心深い護衛はいません。けれど今日はその強い肩によりかからなくてもいいようだ」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}阿洁塔露出了柔和的微笑。{/n}“谢谢你，勇敢的乌尔法，没有比你更可靠、更警惕的守护者了。不过今天，我不需要依靠你强壮的臂膀。”
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta smiles softly.{/n} "Thank you, brave Ulfar. One could not ask for a more dependable and vigilant protector. But I won't need to lean on your mighty shoulder today."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿洁塔露出了柔和的微笑。{/n}“谢谢你，勇敢的乌尔法，没有比你更可靠、更警惕的守护者了。不过今天，我不需要依靠你强壮的臂膀。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta esquisse un sourire.{/n} « Merci, brave Ulfar. On ne saurait rêver compagnon plus fidèle et vaillant que vous, mais je n'aurai pas besoin de me reposer sur vos robustes épaules aujourd'hui. »
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta smiles softly.{/n} "Thank you, brave Ulfar. One could not ask for a more dependable and vigilant protector. But I won't need to lean on your mighty shoulder today."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta esquisse un sourire.{/n} « Merci, brave Ulfar. On ne saurait rêver compagnon plus fidèle et vaillant que vous, mais je n'aurai pas besoin de me reposer sur vos robustes épaules aujourd'hui. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta sonríe amablemente.{/n} «Gracias, valiente Ulfar. No puedo imaginar a un protector más fiable y observador. Pero hoy no dependeré de su poderoso hombro».
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta smiles softly.{/n} "Thank you, brave Ulfar. One could not ask for a more dependable and vigilant protector. But I won't need to lean on your mighty shoulder today."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta sonríe amablemente.{/n} «Gracias, valiente Ulfar. No puedo imaginar a un protector más fiable y observador. Pero hoy no dependeré de su poderoso hombro».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta lächelt sanft.{/n} "Danke, tapferer Ulfar. Niemand kann sich einen verlässlicheren und wachsameren Beschützer wünschen. Aber heute werde ich Eure mächtige Schulter nicht benötigen."
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta smiles softly.{/n} "Thank you, brave Ulfar. One could not ask for a more dependable and vigilant protector. But I won't need to lean on your mighty shoulder today."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta lächelt sanft.{/n} "Danke, tapferer Ulfar. Niemand kann sich einen verlässlicheren und wachsameren Beschützer wünschen. Aber heute werde ich Eure mächtige Schulter nicht benötigen."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta hafifçe gülümsüyor.{/n} "Teşekkür ederim gözü pek Ulfar. Senden daha güvenilir ve ihtiyatlı bir koruyucu hayal bile edemiyorum. Ancak bugün senin omzuna yaslanmama gerek kalmayacak."
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta smiles softly.{/n} "Thank you, brave Ulfar. One could not ask for a more dependable and vigilant protector. But I won't need to lean on your mighty shoulder today."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta hafifçe gülümsüyor.{/n} "Teşekkür ederim gözü pek Ulfar. Senden daha güvenilir ve ihtiyatlı bir koruyucu hayal bile edemiyorum. Ancak bugün senin omzuna yaslanmama gerek kalmayacak."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
